name: Yak's Progress
overview: In the beginning was the Screen, and the Screen was blank. Commodore moved upon the face of the Screen saying 'let there be sprites'. These eight games are a record of my progress with the Commodore 64. The early games are obviously VIC-influenced, the later ones considerably more complex and detailed. Many are now difficult to get hold of and the idea of a collection seems a good one.... Enjoy them - I love 'em all! AMC Matrix Laser Zone RMC Sheep in Space Metagalactic Llamas Ancipital Hover Bovver
